#define P(X) ( fract( sin((X-p)* vec2(127,311) ) *4e5 ) - .5 )             \
             * mat2(cos( ( mod(X-p,2.)*2.-1.) *iTime/z + vec4(0,33,11,0))) \
             * ( X )                                                 //
#define mi                                                            \
    vec2  R = iResolution.xy,                                         \
          U = ( u+u - R ) / R.y;                                      \
    for( float z=1., p,f ; z > .007; z /= 2. )                        \
        f = fract( p = U.x/z ),                                       \
        O += z *  mix( P(f), P(f-1.), f*f*(3.-f-f) ).x;               \
                                                                      \
    O = texture(iChannel0, (u-vec2(-1,1)) / R ) * vec4(.96,.97,.98,0) \
        + max( 1. - R.y/3.* abs( O+O - U.y-.5 ), 0. );
